title: BNP Paribas Loses Bid to Throw Out $21 Million Sudan Verdict
description: A New York judge denied BNP Paribas SA’s request to throw out a $20.75 million verdict against the bank for funding a regime that committed widespread human rights abuses in Sudan.
content: A New York judge denied BNP Paribas SA’s request to throw out a $20.75 million verdict against the bank for funding a regime that committed widespread human rights abuses in Sudan.
